headline: Full-Stack Developer & AI Engineer
shortBio: Passionate software engineer with 8+ years of experience building scalable web applications and AI-powered solutions. Specialized in React, Node.js, and machine learning implementations.

children.text: I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for creating innovative solutions that make a real impact. My journey in tech began over 8 years ago, and I've had the privilege of working with startups and established companies alike.

My expertise spans across modern web technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, and various cloud platforms. Recently, I've been focusing heavily on AI/ML integration, building intelligent applications that leverage the power of machine learning.
When I'm not coding, you'll find me contributing to open-source projects, writing technical articles, or exploring the latest advancements in technology.
